plot: When BFF Cheerleaders sent out for summer camp - they have no idea what sort of excitement awaits. Teamwork becomes the only way to survive.
plot_en: When BFF Cheerleaders sent out for summer camp - they have no idea what sort of excitement awaits. Teamwork becomes the only way to survive.
plot_es: When BFF Cheerleaders sent out for summer camp - they have no idea what sort of excitement awaits. Teamwork becomes the only way to survive.
title: Cheerleaders vs. Redneck Zombies
